title: Weil am Rhein
extract:
Weil am Rhein is in Black Forest.


Understand


Get in


By train
1 Weil am Rhein station.   


By tram
There is an international tram line from Basel.


Get around


See
1 Vitra Design Museum.   (updated Sep 2018)


Do


Buy


Eat


Budget
There are many Turkish restaurants / kebab shops in town.

1 Newsad KeinHack Imbiss, Hauptstraße 387. (updated Feb 2023)
2 Chläbi, Eisenbahnstraße 9. German restaurants (updated Feb 2023)
3 Josefstüble, Robert-Koch-Straße 1. German restaurant (updated Feb 2023)
4 Gaststätte Alte Zunft, Rathauspl. 5. German restaurant (updated Feb 2023)
5 Restaurant Peking, Hauptstraße 384. Chinese (updated Feb 2023)
6 Pizzeria Casanova, Egerstraße 6. Italian (updated Feb 2023)
7 Hanoi Quan, Hauptstraße 179. Vietnamese (updated Feb 2023)


Mid-range
8 Yusuf´s Steak Pizza Pasta, Hauptstr. 160, ☏ +49 7621 79 22 64, info@yusufs.de. closed Tuesdays. (updated Feb 2023)
9 Mendoza Steakhouse, Hauptstraße 429. (updated Feb 2023)
10 Hebelhof, Turmstraße 19. German restaurant (updated Feb 2023)
11 Galileos Bar & Restaurant, Hauptstraße 160. (updated Feb 2023)
12 Vogtskeller, Große Gaß 34. Beer garden in Haltingen (updated Feb 2023)


Splurge
13 Landgasthof & Hotel Rebstock Haltingen, Große Gaß 30. (updated Feb 2023)


Drink


Sleep
1 carathotel Basel / Weil am Rhein, Alte Straße 58, 79576 Weil am Rhein (near Autobahn exit A5), ☏ +49 7621 7070, fax: +49 7621 707650, info@carat-hotel-basel.de. single from €80; double from €100;. (updated Aug 2015)
